member.name: T:VisionAiChrono.API.Controllers.AccountController
member.summary: Manages user accounts, including registration, login, password reset, roles, and token handling.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Authentication service.
User manager service.
Email sender service.
Sign-in manager service.
Unit of work service.
Password hasher service.
Logger instance for logging controller actions.

member.summary: Registers a new client account.
member.param: Client registration details.
member.returns: Authentication response with token and status.

member.summary: Logs in a user or company.
member.param: Login credentials (email, password).
member.returns: Authentication response with token and status.

member.name: M:VisionAiChrono.API.Controllers.AccountController.DeleteAccount(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a user account and all related information permanently.
member.param: The unique identifier of the user to be deleted.
member.returns: A result indicating whether the deletion was successful.
member.response: The provided user ID is invalid.
No user found with the specified ID.

member.returns: Status message.

member.summary: Changes the user's password.

member.returns: Status message.

member.name: M:VisionAiChrono.API.Controllers.AccountController.IsEmailInUse(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the email is already in use.
member.param: The email to check.
member.returns: True if the email is in use; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:VisionAiChrono.API.Controllers.AccountController.GetUserInfo(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves user information based on the provided user ID.
member.param: The unique identifier (GUID) of the user to retrieve.
member.returns: An containing an with the user details if found, or a not found response if the user does not exist.
member.response: Returns the user information when the user is found.
Returned when no user matches the provided user ID.

member.name: M:VisionAiChrono.API.Controllers.AccountController.GetUsers
member.summary: Retrieves all users from the system asynchronously.
member.remarks: This endpoint logs the process of fetching users and returns an containing the result. If no users are found, a 404 Not Found response is returned; otherwise, a 200 OK response is returned with the list of users.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation, containing an with an . The response includes a success flag, message, status code, and the list of users if successful.
member.response: Returns the list of users when retrieval is successful.
Returned when no users are found in the system.

member.name: M:VisionAiChrono.API.Controllers.AccountController.RefreshToken
member.summary: Refreshes the user's authentication token.
member.returns: New authentication token.

member.name: M:VisionAiChrono.API.Controllers.AccountController.SetRefreshToken(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Sets the refresh token cookie in the response.
member.param: The refresh token string.
The expiration time for the token.
